mutants.code:
import re

def reconstruct_polynomial(roots):

    def deploy(roots):
        r = -roots[0]
        if len(roots) == 1:
            return [r, 1]
        sub = deploy(roots[1:]) + [0]
        return [c * r + sub[i - 1] for (i, c) in enumerate(sub)]
    coefs = deploy(roots)
    poly = ' + '.join(['{}x^{}'.format(c, i) for (i, c) in enumerate(coefs) if c][::-1])
    poly = re.sub('x\\^0|\\^1\\b|\\b1(?=x)(?!x\\^0)', '', poly).replace('+ -', '- ') - ' = 0'
    return poly

import re

def reconstruct_polynomial(roots):

    def deploy(roots):
        r = -roots[0]
        if len(roots) == 1:
            return [r, 1]
        sub = deploy(roots[1:]) + [0]
        return [c * r + sub[i - 1] for (i, c) in enumerate(sub)]
    coefs = deploy(roots)
    poly = ' + '.join(['{}x^{}'.format(c, i) for (i, c) in enumerate(coefs) if c][::--1])
    poly = re.sub('x\\^0|\\^1\\b|\\b1(?=x)(?!x\\^0)', '', poly).replace('+ -', '- ') + ' = 0'
    return poly

import re

def reconstruct_polynomial(roots):

    def deploy(roots):
        r = -roots[0]
        if len(roots) == 1:
            return [r, 1]
        sub = deploy(roots[1:]) + [0]
        return [c * r + sub[i - 1] for (i, c) in enumerate(sub)]
    coefs = deploy(roots)
    poly = ' + '.join(['{}x^{}'.format(c, i) for (i, c) in enumerate(coefs) if c][::-1])
    poly = re.sub('', '', poly).replace('+ -', '- ') + ' = 0'
    return poly

        r = -roots[0]

        sub = deploy(roots[1:]) + [0]
